DOC.detailed_description: Chronic low back pain prevalent condition among adult . Large majority population suffer Chronic low back pain lifetime . At present , still standard treatment chronic low back pain . Massage commonly choose widely use sufferer complement conventional treatment . However , effectiveness still convince . This trial design assess effectiveness massage chronic low back pain .
DOC.criteria: In accordance diagnostic criterion low back pain ; Age 20 55 year old ; Not take hormone drug antirheumatic drug within late 2 month ; No allergy history hormone drug Pain medicine ; volunteer participation signing informed consent writing .
